name: NYANSA
description:
Educational games which make learning fun and exciting! Games which fulfill the world's needs for interactive games.

NYANSA’s educational games enhance judgement, analysis and strategic thinking, making it easy to learn about the things which matter most.

team.name: Shaun Scoon
team.bioHtml: Worked at MAMA Youth Project, Accenture

team.name: JOSEPH ANTWI KUSI
team.bioHtml: Founder @NYANSA • Worked at @Accenture, @Royal Bank of Scotland • Studied at @University Of Wales Institute, Cardiff

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer
jobs.description:
The team at Nyansa is looking to fill the CTO role. This role will involve overseeing all technical aspects and technological resources at Nyansa for the purpose of organisational growth. 

You will establish a technological vision for the company and lead the technological development of our products including educational software and applications.
